degrees.institution: Shree B.P. Brahmbhatt Arts & M.H. Guru Commerce College
degrees.description: Advanced expertise in strategic financial management and corporate governance. Specialized in analyzing complex business environments and applying theoretical knowledge to solve high-level fiscal and managerial challenges.

Developed a robust foundation in financial accounting, taxation, and business law. Focused on building technical proficiency in data analysis and organizational management to drive operational efficiency.
